title: Memory Game
description: Let's play Memory Game! Flip the cards and find the matching pairs. A fun game to test your concentration and memory skills. Try the time attack mode and beat your best record!
winMessage: Congratulations! You have successfully completed the game!
objectiveText: The objective of the game is to find all matching pairs of cards within the time limit.
rule1: The game starts with a grid of cards facing down.
rule2: Players flip over two cards at a time.
rule3: If the cards match, they are counted as a pair and the player moves on to the next turn.
rule4: If the cards do not match, they are flipped back over.
rule5: The game ends when all pairs have been found.
noteText: Memory Game is a great way to improve your concentration and short-term memory. Try the time attack mode and beat your best record!
